info.name: Dark Fusion - DuckDuckGo
info.description: Made in a similar style to my Dark Fusion - Google theme. This theme darkens the DuckDuckGo with fully customizable backgrounds!
info.additionalInfo:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

This works best when you enable the built in dark theme because there might be some issues.

Version 1.1

Many fixes to text color. Better support for sub-features like Wikipedia results, company information, and advanced search.

Version 1.0

Initial version.
